name: Summit Place Guesthouse

reviews.text: Six of us stayed at Summit Place for two nights as we had a wedding nearby. The main reasons we chose Summit Place were proximity to the wedding venue, and price (great value).
reviews.title: Lovely Accommodation, Great Value

likes.liked: — Room quality, pool area, friendly and helpful owners, price.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are beautiful, modern, very spacious, spotlessly clean and with self catering facilities. Very comfy beds and great showers. Quiet at night. The owners are very friendly and helpful, and the staff make a great breakfast. The pool area and grounds are also really lovely, and have a residential, rather than hotel type feel. Good security with high walls etc For all those things I can't recommend it more highly.
reviews.title: Awesome accommodation at Summit Place

likes.liked: — we were exactly where we wanted to be in terms of location, convenience, service, style and friendliness

description: Nestled in the heart of the Constantia Valley Wine Route with self-catering and B&B facilities. A quiet spacious villa ideal for business & holiday. Near to: city, airport, Table Mountain, Kirstenbosch Gardens & beaches. Close to awesome restaurants,shops, wineries and golf courses. Sunny pool & mountain views.
